content: mollie mae is a quick and simple hat knit in the round from the bottom up for an alternative look you could knit the waves in different colours **sizing ** to fit average sized womans head with 20 - 22 circumference 51 - 56cm **materials ** aran weight yarn shown in cascade 220 superwash aran main colour 80 yds / 73m contrast colour 40yds / 37m 3 75mm / us5 16 circular needle 4 5mm / us7 16 circular needle plus dpns 4 stitch markers 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/verily-knits/3509131/1-25#8
